title: Overlord in Cultivation - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
author: One Leaf In Sky   一叶青天
description: The doomsday fell upon the earth when a dragon coffin sealed under a snow mountain for ages shifted, and the civilization of gods and devils began. The whole universe turned into a fantastic new world where everyone could rise to the top through cultivation. A lucky young boy seized the opportunity, and started his journey to be an overlord in cultivation.>
